main_definition: Having the skill, means, or opportunity to do something.

meanings_and_examples.example: She is very able when it comes to playing musical instruments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Capable of being done or achieved.
meanings_and_examples.example: The task was not able at the time due to lack of resources.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having the permission or right to do something.
meanings_and_examples.example: After getting parental consent, he was able to attend the concert alone.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not disabled; capable of moving freely and easily.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite her injury, she remained able to walk with a limp.
